Desc.entry: A social enterprise that provides volunteering opportunities for young adults aged 16-25 years, to work with young people through activities in music and creative media, arts and crafts, sports, culture and heritage, playwork and the environment. Volunteers will work in local communities throughout South East Sheffield, from Athelstan to Woodthorpe. Volunteers will be subject to a CRB check.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
